results.title: Complement inhibition and statins prevent fetal brain cortical abnormalities in a mouse model of preterm birth.
results.text_hl: The blockade of glutamate receptors prevented @GENE_HC @GENE_15139 @@@C5a@@@-induced abnormal growth and increased cell death in isolated fetal cortical neurons. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ prevented cortical @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Growth_Retardation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005317 @@@fetal brain developmental and metabolic abnormalities@@@ -in vivo and in vitro.

citations.NLM: Pedroni SM, Gonzalez JM, Wade J, Jansen MA, Serio A, Marshall I, Lennen RJ, Girardi G. Complement inhibition and statins prevent fetal brain cortical abnormalities in a mouse model of preterm birth. Biochim Biophys Acta. 2014 Jan;1842(1):107-15. PMID: 24184716
